The divine functions are secret, with no harm from beginning to end.
Those who uphold it will surely attain benefit and happiness.
I will now explain it for you. Do you wish to hear it or not?
At that time, Vajrapāṇi joyfully leaped for joy.
He bowed his head to the Buddha's feet, knelt on his right knee, and joined his palms.
He said, World-Honored One, please explain it for me.
The Buddha said, Listen carefully and contemplate it well.
I will now explain it for you in detail.
What are the eight names of the universal secret mantra?
The first is called the Treasury of Meritorious Virtues.
The second is called the Adorned Elephant Ear.
The third is called the Virtuous and Courageous.
The fourth is called the Cloud of Supreme Realities.
The fifth is called the Accomplishment of Fiery Energy.
The sixth is called the Subtle Color.
The seventh is called the Adornment.
The eighth is called the Vajra.
